mapper.insert: insert into mem ( mno, niknm, siteno, email, pic, locno) values(mno, niknm, siteno, email, pic, locno)
mapper.select: select niknm, siteno, email, pic, license, msgrcyn, prmsg, regcnt, datcnt, choocnt, favcnt,indt,levno,locno from mem where mno= #{mno}
mapper.update: update mem set email =#{email} where mno = #{mno}
